nodes.text: Delta-T-3 was the designation of a YV-865 Aurore-class freighter that was used by the Zygerrian Slave Empire during the Clone Wars. After a failed mission to Zygerria and the capture of Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, Governor Gupat Roshti, and Clone Captain CT-7567, Delta-T-3 was used to transport them along with other slaves to the Kadavo system for conditioning at the Kadavo slave processing facility.

Delta-T-3 first appeared in "Slaves of the Republic" and its designation is written in aurebesh on its wings. Additionally, other writing on the starboard hull spells "Spa", and there is further writing on the port side.
